item.title: Sats are the Standard
item.description: 100000000/BTCUSD Chart by TradingView new TradingView.widget( { "width": 710, "height" : 610, "symbol": "100000000/BTCUSD", "timezone": "Etc/UTC", "theme": "dark", "style": "1", "locale": "en", "toolbar_bg": "#f1f3f6", "enable_publishing": false, "range": "12M", "allow_symbol_change": true, "container_id": "tradingview_dff9d" } ); You’re not buying Bitcoin, you’re selling dollars. The dollar is going to zero. This is what hyperinflation looks like. When looking at the Bitcoin price, it is fun to look at how it’s going up.
